name: Geezer Butler
description: '''Terence Michael Joseph''' "'''Geezer'''" '''Butler''' (born 17 July 1949) is an English retired musician, best known as the bassist and primary lyricist of the pioneering [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band [[Black Sabbath]]. He has also recorded and performed with [[Heaven & Hell (band)|Heaven & Hell]], [[GZR]], [[Ozzy Osbourne]], and [[Deadland Ritual]].
